name: Chasing Reflections
description:
Chasing Reflections follows an amnesiac raven waking up in a dreary and unfamiliar mansion with no memory of who or where they are.

Your goal is to traverse the halls of this seemingly infinite mansion, avoiding creatures called 'Echoes' and a particularly aggressive reflection, and find a way back home.

...Wherever it is.

--- --- --- --- ---
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
S - Crouch
Space - Jump

Mouse Click - Interact Objects and Doors
E - Enter Mirrors
Q - Exit Mirrors
W - Enter Door
